dcterms:creator: Eva Sharma
Chen Li
Lu Wang
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing 1.3 million patent documents along with their summaries, designed to alleviate limitations found in previous datasets for summarization tasks.
dcterms:title: BigPatent dataset

dcterms:creator: Guy Lev
Michal Shmueli-Scheuer
Jonathan Herzig
Achiya Jerbi
David Konopnicki
dcterms:description: A dataset and scalable annotation method for summarizing scientific papers based on conference talks, where summaries are generated by retrieving relevant sentences from the presented papers.
dcterms:title: TalkSumm dataset
